actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 with respect to juvenile delinquency in schools.
short_title: Juvenile Delinquency in the Schools Act

summary.text: Juvenile Delinquency in the Schools Act - Establishes within the Department of Justice's Office of Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention a Safe School Center to assist State and local educational agencies in preventing delinquency and vandalism in schools. Establishes a Safe School Advisory Panel. Authorizes a program of Federal grants for State and local school delinquency prevention programs.

titles.title: Juvenile Delinquency in the Schools Act
A bill to amend the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 with respect to juvenile delinquency in schools.
